document.full_text: bradford burgess scored 25 points and 11th-seeded virginia commonwealth made it three victories in five days sunday night, routing third-seeded purdue.
document.title: southwest: virginia commonwealth 94, purdue 76: v.c.u. earns first sweet 16 appearance with upset of purdue
lines_and_colors: bradford burgess scored 25 points and 11th-seeded virginia commonwealth made it three victories in five days sunday night, routing third-seeded purdue.
